body:
* Please merge new package `popt` #12783 before this
* This PR needed by `singularity@3.4.0` in ~#12754~ #12785

Couldn't find any explicit discussion of deps in upstream project, so I had to find the first two the hard way.  I got lucky -- they were already in spack.

Now I'm hitting this:
```
     172    checking for poptConfigFileToString in -lpopt... no
  >> 173    configure: error: You need popt 1.7 or newer to compile.
```

`popt` appears to be a command-line parser.  
* Is this its real home page?  https://openwrt.org/packages/pkgdata/libpopt 
* Or this?  https://launchpad.net/popt   

Seems like a multiply forked codebase, perhaps?   @hartzell is there a way to resolve this, without asking the cryptsetup folks directly?

Edit: updated PR references for popt and singularity 3.4.0
title: cryptsetup: new package
